Compare stent non-stent base outcome define composite symptom drive target vessel revascularization ( TVR ) , unplanned surgical revascularization target limb need target limb amputation 12 month post-index procedure ( Primary efficacy endpoint ) 2 . DOC.brief_title: Multi-Center Registry Peripheral Arterial Disease Interventions Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo endovascular intervention receive either stent percutaneous transluminal angioplasty ( PTA ) superficial femoral , popliteal , peroneal , anterior tibial , posterior tibial artery enter registry . Patients undergoing treatment external common iliac artery admissible registry , unless artery treat addition one five aforementioned artery . The registry collect data form patient background information , procedural data , follow-up data patient 's medical record . Data available since Jan 1 2005 include registry , 14,000 patient include . The data enter software , REDCAP , automatically provide data quality verification processing . Specifically , data field collect registry : I ) Background Information 1 . Site , attend operator , month-year procedure 2 . Patient height , weight , age , race , sex 3 . Rutherford claudication category , leave right ankle brachial index , ambulatory status , claudication free distance 4 . Risk factor diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , prior history lower extremity percutaneous intervention 5 . Patient comorbidities coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure , prior myocardial infarction , stroke , transient ischemic attack , chronic kidney disease , . II ) Lesion Characteristics ( enter data five lesion ) 1 . Access site relative target limb , sheath size , target limb ( left right ) 2 . Target vessel : superficial femoral artery , popliteal artery , peroneal artery , anterior tibial artery , posterior tibial artery 3 . Which , , Iliac artery treat procedure 4 . Target lesion location ( ostial , proximal , medial , distal ) , estimate vessel diameter , estimate vessel length 5 . Lesion characteristic ( heavily calcify , diffuse , thrombus , chronic total occlusion ( CTO ) , in-stent restenosis , restenosis post balloon angioplasty , profunda femoris disease ) 6 . Planned revascularization strategy : stent non-stent base IIa ) CTO Characteristics ( Only require CTO lesion ) 1 . Type proximal distal stump , sidebranches present , collateral fill distal vessel , tortuosity , prior attempt cross CTO 2 . Antegrade retrograde cross strategy , cross technique , number attempt 3 . Crossing device use , microcatheters use , sub-intimal re-entry device use ( ) , embolic protection device use III ) Intervention Details 1 . Atherectomy device use ( Cutting Balloon , TurboHawk , SilverHawk , Rotablator , Laser ) 2 . Pre post-dilation balloon information ( type , length , width , average atmospheric pressure , number inflation ) 3 . Stent information ( indication stent , length , width , maximum pressure , overlap previous stent ) 4 . Aspiration/Thrombectomy use , thrombolytic therapy use 5 . Percent change stenosis TIMI flow ( ) IV ) Outcomes 1 . Technical success ( < 30 % residual stenosis ) , procedural success ( < 30 % residual stenosis without complication ) , case comment 2 . Anti-coagulation use , medical therapy ( plavix , aspirin , lipid lower therapy , angiotensin receptor blocker , beta blocker , cilostazol , trental , insulin , oral hypoglycemics ) 3 . Duration procedure , fluoroscopy ( amount use , type , time ) 4 . Any procedural complication V ) Follow-Up 1 . Month year follow-up 2 . Rutherford category , leave right ankle brachial index , claudication-free distance , ambulatory status , change claudication ( improve , , worsen ) 3 . Duplex ultrasound perform 4 . Adverse event experience ( death , myocardial infarction , stroke , stent thrombosis , stent fracture , angiography , repeat endovascular intervention , surgical revascularization , amputation target non-target limb ) Follow-up data record clinical visit six twelve month procedure . If patient undergoes repeat intervention target limb , new record create procedure .
DOC.criteria: Underwent Endovascular Intervention Treated Superficial Femoral , Popliteal , Peroneal , Anterior Tibial , Posterior Tibial Arteries Failed Revascularization Attempt Surgical Bypass Only Iliac Artery Treated
